data.text: @jgnoelle Too bad I've already thrown away my most recent recipts LOL https://t.co/rSg28hFB2P
@MichaelLRoss7 I never forgot about smiles. I can see a smile in a person's eyes
@jgnoelle You mean like smiles? 😊 CDC is ramping down on masks, and only one US state still has an indoor mask mandate - Hawaii
@jgnoelle Oh man! Yeah the sanitized carts made it impossible for me to shop in stores with carts bc it gets in the air. Hives on my face, hands, etc. Maybe someday...
@MichaelLRoss7 I completely forgot they existed until about 30 minutes ago
@RoseDGWrites Oh wow. I'm not sure what sort of solution they were using but they were misting the hand baskets with something too.
@jgnoelle Oh wow. My friend is telling me they never did that here. I believe her...my husband would never put groceries on a sanitized belt, because it wouldn't be safe to bring them home to me.

@RoseDGWrites They did. At the height of Covid only one person could put their items on the belt at a time and they would wipe it down between customers. Then they got in self-sanitizing belts but you still to wait. I actually forgot all about these dividers until about half an hour ago!
